Credits:
--------

I'd like to thank all the people contacting me with suggestions and bug reports. Your feedback is always welcome and helps improve this project. 

Especially I'd like to thank:
Francesco Montorsi for setting up the new parser build system as well as the cvs server at sourceforge. Torsten Brischalle for providing me with the Formula generator necessary for making the benchmarks, Ion Vasilief for Feedback, suggestions and help with the MSVC6 adaptation, Giampaolo Belini for his help in fixing bugs, Patrick Leabo for his feedback and valuable suggestions and Andreas Nicolai for creating BCB project files and fixing some BCB related issues.
